name: Space Exploration (jellycake222)
description:
You are an astronaut exploring a couple of planets in an unknown area. Your ship is also low on fuel making it difficult to explore efficiently. Luckily you know that there are deposits of oil that you can use as fuel. Getting to them may be difficult. 

One of the planets is also known for having meteor showers, so be carful.

Controls:

  • A: Move left / rotate anti-clockwise around a planet.
  • D: Move right / rotate clockwise around a planet.
  • Space: Jump.

This is a game made for Mini Jam 63, theme of "future". Due to time constraints I was not able to get everything completely done, or not to the extent that I would have liked. If any bugs appear during gameplay you will have to refresh the page. Also the game may seem a little confusing confusing at times. Sorry with it not being the cleanest game.
